import './App.css'; function App() { function toggleMenu() { var menu = document.getElementById("menu"); if (menu.style.display === "block") { menu.style.display = "none"; } else { menu.style.display = "block"; } } document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { var menuToggleInput = document.querySelector("#menuToggle input"); menuToggleInput.addEventListener("change", function() { if (this.checked) { document.body.classList.add("menu-open"); } else { document.body.classList.remove("menu-open"); } }); }); document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() { const scrollStep = 300; // Adjust scroll step as needed document.querySelector('.arrow-left').addEventListener('click', function() { document.querySelector('.products-list').scrollBy({ left: -scrollStep, behavior: 'smooth' }); }); document.querySelector('.arrow-right').addEventListener('click', function() { document.querySelector('.products-list').scrollBy({ left: scrollStep, behavior: 'smooth' }); }); }); return (
